Name: Arca's Path VR
About the game: Tricked by a wicked android witch, you must seek a path home and escape the simulated world of Arca. Fully integrated across all major VR platforms, with intuitive hands-free gameplay, Arca’s Path is an atmospheric VR gaming experience. A Dark Fairytale – Enter the simulated world of Arca and unlock the truth, in a truly immersive VR gaming experience. Challenging Physics-based Gameplay – Find your path through 25 levels of stunning crystalline landscapes. Hands-free Control – Head tracking VR technology uses your gaze to intuitively lead the character’s sphere with skill and precision. Ambient Soundtrack – Experience the chilled experimental electro music of Ninja Tunes artist, Raffertie.
